game.name: Gravebound
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gravebound - the post-apocalyptic extraction shooter where humanity’s biggest mistake wasn’t nuclear war… It was giving your toaster Wi-Fi! Load in, scavenge loot, and fight through mechanical madness — extract alive and keep your gear, or dive deeper for bigger rewards (and even angrier appliances)
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gravebound - the post-apocalyptic extraction shooter where humanity’s biggest mistake wasn’t nuclear war… It was giving your toaster Wi-Fi! Load in, scavenge loot, and fight through mechanical madness — extract alive and keep your gear, or dive deeper for bigger rewards (and even angrier appliances)
